name: Ext_R2_DiagnosticReport_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DiagnosticReport.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticReport.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReport|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: registered | partial | final | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error
element.definition: The status of the diagnostic report as a whole.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.status` maps to R4B `DiagnosticReport.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element DiagnosticReport.status is flagged IsModifier

element.definition: The status of the diagnostic report as a whole.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.status` maps to R4B `DiagnosticReport.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The status of the diagnostic report as a whole.
